name: Warlorn: Legends of Valenia
description:
Take on the role of Tyus, a young man raised in the peaceful land of Valenia. When a figure from his past re-emerges, he is thrust into an adventure in which he must team up with unlikely friends and discover his true origins to save Valenia from being conquered by ruthless invaders. 

Key Characters:

                                     

Tyus: In a world in which arcane arts are only used to heal or deceive, Tyus must confront his unique flame abilities and the destruction they can cause. 

Desa: A former bounty hunter with a  fiery disposition. She refuses to let her lack of arcane abilities stop her from avenging her sisters.

Mier: An amnesiac healer with a heart of gold. He is a devout pacifist, but his arcane support is key to surviving difficult battles.

Valora: A resourceful woman encountered in uncharted territory. Her eyes emit a familiar amber glow.

Features:

- Uncover the lost lore of Valenia and the groups that inhabit it

- Rally your party to fight in turn-based combat inspired by classic RPGs

- Explore Valenia to discover diverse locations and meet unique characters

- Master various arcane arts and special moves to defeat your foes

Length:  5-7 hours
